webhook.name: Next.js ISR Revalidation
webhook.description: Revalidates cache tags and paths when content is updated

projection.path:
select(
  _type == "post" => "/blog/" + slug.current,
  _type == "category" => "/blog/categorie/" + slug.current,
  _type == "homePage" => "/",
  _type == "aboutPage" => "/over-mij",
  _type == "coachingPage" => "/coaching",
  _type == "contactPage" => "/contact",
  _type == "approachPage" => "/aanpak",
  _type == "page" => "/" + slug.current,
  _type in ["header", "footer", "configuration"] => null
)
